Klasse Planet

java.lang.Object
greenfoot.World
Planet
public class Planet extends greenfoot.World
The planet is the place where the actors can operate.
Version:
24 September 2025
Autor:
Paul Jonas Dohle

  • Konstruktorübersicht

    Konstruktoren
    Konstruktor
    Beschreibung
    Planet()
    Creates a new world with 16 columns and 12 rows, where each cell is 50x50 pixels.
    Planet(int cols, int rows)
    Creates a new world with the given number of columns and rows, where each cell is 50x50 pixels.
